domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Situation Room
entity.description: "The Situation Room With Wolf Blitzer" is the command center for breaking news, politics and extraordinary reports from around the world. Patterned after the concept of the White House Situation Room, CNN's lead political anchor Wolf Blitzer hosts newsmakers and experts to discuss and analyze the stories that are driving today's news.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text:
Great news!! Just got out of a VERY importent meeting in MY White House situation room! After 3 hours of HEATED debate between MY advisors & six of the BEST medical scientists in America, I am pleased to announce that I NO LONGER think that Coronavirus is a hoax!!
#CoronaLockdown
